name: Abyssal exploration
description:
Have you ever wanted to dive in the ocean abyss ? If yes, you may want to take a look at this ! Dive in the 4 levels of deepness of the ocean and discover it's inhabitants. There is no challenge or objective, just play around and explore to our heart's content.

Use a controller to play, preferably an Xbox 360 one ( I haven't tested with a playstation or pc controller), and use the left joystick to move around and LT and RT to move up and down.

This game was made in a collaboration between two schools, the ENJMIN and the EESI ( in Poitier and Angoulême ) on the theme of the museum of Angoulême, in about 3 days.

Team : 

  • Hugo Malezieux https://dentelin.itch.io/
  • Romane Garcia https://romanegarcia.itch.io/
  • Perrine Pau https://pandamnesik.itch.io/
  • Laura CAILLOT https://www.instagram.com/laurrainette/
  • Marie Ursi https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjyhVvMbss7d_dyNuWxDYRQ
  • Rose Frances
